alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 1:45PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central San Diego County through 230 PM PDT... At 145 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pine Valley, or 7 miles west of I-8 Between Pine Valley And Boulevard, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Alpine, Cuyamaca Rancho State Park, Lake Morena, Potrero, Pine Valley, Descanso, Campo, Viejas Indian Reservation, Barrett Lake, Japatul Valley, Guatay, Tecate, Skye Valley, and Dulzura. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Inland Valleys; San Diego County Mountains
